articles.title: ‘When I’m singing, I don’t think about my grief’: Choir of patients enriching their lives through music
articles.description: A Dublin GP practice is the unlikely location where a group of patients meet to sing every week
articles.content:
Dr Una O’Neill (right) with Deirdre Gannon, a member of the Mercer’s Melodies choir, rehearsing at Mercer's Medical Centre in Dublin. Photograph: Dara Mac Dónaill
“We can be heroes just for one day.”

articles.content:

articles.title: Agriculture Victoria declares end of H7N8 avian influenza outbreak
articles.description: Agriculture Victoria has declared four properties in Euroa free from avian influenza after disease eradication activities.
articles.content:
Poultry farmers are once again able to move birds across north-east Victoria without restriction after Agriculture Victoria declared an end to the latest avian influenza outbreak in the state.
In February, detections of the H7N8 bird flu strain were ... [2728 chars]

articles.title: House adopts quad-comm pitch to revive death penalty
articles.description: The House of Representatives has adopted a recommendation from the quad-committee (quad-comm) to revive the imposition of death penalty or capital punishment...
articles.content:
The House of Representatives has adopted a recommendation from the quad-committee (quad-comm) to revive the imposition of death penalty or capital punishment in the country.

articles.title: HPV-related cancer can affect men too, say doctors
articles.description: HPV vaccination crucial for preventing cervical cancer in India; low awareness, high cost hindering progress, doctors say.
articles.content:
Human Papillomavirus (HPV)-related disease, particularly cervical cancer, is the second highest cause of cancer among women in India.
Cervical cancer is preventable with timely vaccination and screening. Unfortunately, due to the lack of awareness, h... [2439 chars]

articles.title: WWE SmackDown results, highlights (June 13): CM Punk, John Cena switch roles; Cody Rhodes advances in King of the Ring
articles.description: Friday's episode of "WWE SmackDown" kicked the build to Night of Champions into high gear and continued the push toward a massive clash between CM Punk and John Cena.
articles.content: The first episode of "WWE SmackDown" after Money in the Bank took place at the Rupp Arena in Lexington, Kentucky. The show kicked the build to June 28's Night of Champions into high gear with four King and Queen of the Ring first-round matchups and c... [7115 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo switches up the rules of console gaming
articles.description: Exclusive franchises and generational familiarity have kept company relevant even as the industry shifts around it
articles.content:
Despite repeated predictions that the rise of mobile platforms, cloud gaming and high-performance PCs would make consoles obsolete, Nintendo has proved that hardware still matters. The record-breaking debut of the Switch 2 has reset the narrative.

articles.description: Ambassador Asim Iftikhar Ahmad says Islamabad stands in resolute solidarity with Iranian govt and people.
